title: OCE Riot, Please do not update the server to 4.21 whilst the OCE Open is still in its first week.
body:
Pretty much the title, I think it's unfair if the servers are changed over tonight because Cybergamer are running a 2 day competition and the next day is going to be completely different to the first one and there is no time to adapt. 
{{item:2009}} Just food for thought maybe the competitive scene is too small to ask for this change but I think it would be nice if you waited til atleast week 1 of these competitions are done {{item:2009}}
